articles.description: Stunning footage shows passengers attack Spirit Airlines gate agents after a baggage dispute before a flight from Detroit to Atlanta.

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: Moderna receives report of COVID-19 vaccine adverse events in San Diego - Reuters
articles.description: Moderna Inc said on Tuesday it had received a report from the California health department that several people at a center in San Diego were treated for possible allergic reactions after vaccination from one lot of its COVID-19 vaccine.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
Jan 19 (Reuters) - Moderna Inc said on Tuesday it had received a report from the California health department that several people at a center in San Diego were treated for possible … [+344 chars]

articles.author: Julia Horowitz, CNN Business
articles.title: MGM scraps UK gambling takeover after $11 billion bid rejected - CNN
articles.description: MGM Resorts International is walking away from an attempt to buy the owner of British gambling brand Ladbrokes after its $11 billion bid was rejected.

articles.author: Antonia Noori Farzan
articles.title: A man was ‘scared to go home due to covid.’ So he spent three months living in Chicago airport, prosecutors say. - The Washington Post
articles.description: Aditya Singh survived in part on food given to him by other passengers, grew out his beard, lectured travelers about Buddhism and Hinduism, and attempted to evade scrutiny by wearing an airport worker’s identification badge.
articles.content: When finally confronted over the weekend, Aditya Singh told police he was scared to go home due to COVID, prosecutors said in a Sunday bond hearing, according to the Associated Press. During his exte… [+4448 chars]
